scenario_text.value:
Hm? I think that’s Kaito and Dracumon over
there.

That’s a scary look on your face. Did
something happen?

You get it, don’t ya? Why Miu’s being all
pissy with you.

“Brush yer teeth” this, “stay warm” that⁠—
whaddaya expect, babying her like that?

Shut up. I don’t need you to tell me my
business.
Well, you ain’t wrong about that.

I don’t know what’s up with you guys. You
won’t tell me a dang thing, after all.

I just don’t wanna see you get all butthurt
when she gives you the cold shoulder.
I ain’t butthurt!

You wanna act tough, act tough. I know a hurt
butt when I see one.
Hmph. Then let me tell you this much:

I ain’t butting into Miu’s business to get
her to like me.
I want to protect her, and that’s a fact.

Wait, you’re saying you don’t care if she
can’t stand you after all that?

I mean, I don’t want her to hate me for no
reason or nothing.

I’d do whatever it takes for her, even if
I gotta play the bad guy.

She can say I’m annoying and hate my guts, if
she gets a peaceful life out of it.
(Kaito... He really does worry about her.)

(Still, I get the feeling his intentions
aren’t getting through to Miu.)

(Is he really all right with that? If he told
her all this, I’m sure she’d get it...)
Huh? Whoa, what the⁠—!
Takuma?! Yo, behind you...
KAAAAAAHHH!!!

Damn, it’s the enemy! Takuma, get behind us,
here!
Yeah, you got it!
Let’s do this, Dracumon!

I hear ya loud and clear! Let’s mop the floor
with these jokers!
